p: The Dome receptor is the most well characterized cytokine receptor in mosquitoes; however, evidence suggests that other cytokine receptors are present which also activate the JAK-STAT pathway. For example, in Culex mosquitoes, a secreted peptide known as Vago was upregulated in response to WNV infection, subsequently activating the JAK-STAT pathway to control infection and reduce viral load [ 28]. However, knockdown of Dome did not inhibit signaling of the JAK-STAT pathway, indicating that Vago activated JAK-STAT via another unknown receptor [ 28].
